name: Olivia L. Wade
description: Olivia is a first-year student at Salem High School interested in art and chemistry.

name: Ada A. Wade
description: Ada is a freelance web developer who enjoys spending time with her daughter, Olivia, and reading poetry in her spare time.

name: William Wade
description: Will currently works as a long-haul trucker delivering supplies to remote communities in Canada with a fondness for old-timey sci-fi novels.

name: Sister Paula
description: Sister Paula is a nun who helped care for Ada after she lost her sight and has been a close family friend ever since.

name: Detective Kurstin Wagner
description: Kurstin is a homicide detective who is used to working long nights and unwinding by playing video games.

name: Detective Saul Omen
description: Saul is a gruff detective with a bit of a gambling problem and a far more dubious reputation than his partner, Kurstin.

name: Detective Jada Johansen
description: Jada, Kurstin's best friend, is an outgoing detective in Vice who is obsessed with spy flicks, perfecting disguises, and hacking.

name: Dr. Sung-Min Park
description: Dr. Park is a child psychiatrist at Hawthron Center, currently assisting the department on a particularly tough case.

name: Jasmine Jackson
description: As Plymouth's star player, Jasmine likes basketball and enjoys spending her free time standing up against bullies.

name: Devin Dieterich
description: Devin is a jerk who seems to enjoy tormenting Olivia and little else.

name: Vigil Lee
description: Despite his scrawny frame, Vigil was caught red-handed at the scene of a brutal crime and thus far remains unresponsive to questioning.

name: Rafe Ram√≠rez
description: Rafe is a medical student wise beyond his years who occasionally sings and dances.

name: Cisco
description: Cisco is an aged golden retriever that grew up alongside Olivia and served as a guide dog for Ada for many years.

name: Nondescript Ravens
description: These living Halloween decorations like to lend their presence to the creepy atmosphere and keep an eye on things from above.

name: Siguard
description: Sigurd is a friendly neighborhood dog with a fondness for Olivia and, more importantly, whatever she feeds him in passing.

name: Lan
description: Lan is a German shepherd puppy with big paws to fill who will take over Cisco's dog guide duties someday.

name: Erik "Odin" Odenkirk, Sr.
description: The founder and president of the Berserkers Motorcycle Club prefers to keep a low profile and not much is known about him.

name: Anders "Njord" Berglin
description: Serving as vice president, Anders is the public face of the club and likely kept in the dark about some of its activities to maintain his clean record.

name: Tyrian "Tyr" Hansen
description: Tyrian serves as both the club's secretary and criminal defense attorney.

name: Richard "Jotun" Rice
description: At six and a half feet tall, this sargent at arms commands the respect of his fellow riders and adversaries alike.

name: Erik "Junior" Odenkirk, Jr.
description: Unlike many members, the president's son never served in the military and doesn't appear to do much else other than pushing papers as club treasurer.

name: Valerie "Valkyrie" Olsen
description: As the club's designated road captain, and sole female member, Valerie has her work cut out for her when leading the group on rides.

name: Rupert "Jerv" Ratner
description: This ill-tempered tail gunner served as a tunnel rat in Vietnam and appears to resent his fellow members for unknown reasons.

name: Felix "Foxtrot" Trah
description: As Jotun's second in command, this lieutenant follows his boss wherever he goes like a lost puppy.

name: Wolfgang "Wolf" ????
description: In his youth, Wolfgang once united the feuding factions of Hunters and Wilders after the split by breaking the Hitman's code upon completing his contract.

name: Bertholdt "Bear" Merigold
description: As sergeant at arms, the eldest son of the Wolf keeps peace both inside and outside the club with a firm hand and calm temperament.

name: Casimir "Cat" Barring
description: Other than the inability to speak, not much is known about the Wolf's middle child.

name: Griffin
description: As treasurer, the youngest son of the Wolf appears to have been relegated to paperwork, much like his counterpart in the Berserker's Motorcycle Club.

name: Johnathan "The Dragon" Jaeger
description: This chainsmoking president of the Grimm Guard has developed a fearsome reputation and is known for his firey temper and crooked smile.

name: Baxter "The Beast" Braun
description: This chainsmoking president of the Grimm Guard has developed a fearsome reputation and is known for his firey temper and crooked smile.

name: Wendell "The Wiccan" Weiss
description: Even before losing his legs, Wendell never let his dwarfism slow him down, and still shows no signs of stopping or outgrowing his lead foot tendencies.

name: Rudolph "Wulf" Wolfe
description: Fueled by the mistaken belief that he can outrun his problems, this road captain often charges ahead without thinking.
Other than her accent, not much is known about this masked member of the destructive band.

name: Dora
description: Other than her accent, not much is known about this masked member of the destructive band.
